values.description: This indicator computes the Kaufman Adaptive Moving Average (KAMA). The Kaufman Adaptive Moving Average is calculated as explained here: http://stockcharts.com/school/doku.php?id=chart_school:technical_indicators:kaufman_s_adaptive_moving_average
